title: Video ingest → plumbing proof → baseline real detections (UAT)

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Given a provided local match video, ingest/iterate frames deterministically and export a valid V1 bundle (plumbing proof).
Then add a baseline local ball detector that produces non-empty detections on the UAT clip while remaining trust-first (missing/unknown over wrong).
non_goals: Full production-grade vision model training or accuracy targets beyond baseline UAT confidence.
Multi-camera synchronization, sensor fusion, or BEV rendering (separate intents).
Guaranteeing detections on every frame; long missing spans are acceptable and preferred over hallucination.
success_criteria: A new CLI path can ingest a local single-camera video and export a bundle under `output/<match_id>/` containing at minimum `manifest.json`, `tracks.jsonl`, `events.json`, `report.json`, and required diagnostics placeholders, and `validate` passes.
The runner is deterministic: same inputs/config produce byte-for-byte identical `tracks.jsonl` and `events.json` (ordering + stable keys).

Baseline ball detections/tracks are demonstrated on the provided UAT clip: at least some frames emit `pos_state=present` ball records with confidence and diagnostics; missing spans are explicit; no fabricated positions/events.

quality_areas.title: Functional objectives
objectives: Video ingest produces deterministic frame_index+t_ms stream.
End-to-end runner exports a valid bundle that passes `validate`.
Baseline detector yields non-empty ball detections on the provided UAT clip.

quality_areas.title: Non-functional objectives
objectives: Trust-first: do not hallucinate ball/event outputs; explicit missing/unknown behavior is enforced (correctness/safety).

work_packages.title: Plumbing proof (ingest → export bundle)
items: TASK-VIDEO-INGEST-001 Deterministic frame decode + timebase extraction for local videos.
TASK-RUN-VIDEO-001 CLI runner: ingest video → run detectors/trackers → export tracks/events bundle.

work_packages.title: Baseline real detections (UAT)
items: TASK-BALL-DET-BASELINE-001 Baseline local ball detector producing non-empty detections on the provided clip with confidence/diagnostics.
